mapper.insert: insert into Vegan_freeBoard( freeboard_no, freeboard_title, freeboard_writer, freeboard_content, freeboard_hit, freeboard_like ) values ((select * from (select max(freeboard_no)+1 from vegan_freeboard) next ), #{freeboard_title},#{freeboard_writer},#{freeboard_content},0,0)
mapper.select: select * from Vegan_freeBoard order by freeboard_no desc
